did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Becker, Hans Karl. Schriften zur Höhlenkunde

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: Typed carbon copies in German, of geological studies made of chalky formations at Frankfurt-am-Main, and of caves at Stromberg and Dinkelberg. Illustrated with photographs, pasted in, and oversize diagrams, folded in.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Becker, Hans Karl, Schriften zur Höhlenkunde, Crerar Ms 129, Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: Typed carbon copies in German, of geological studies made of chalky formations at Frankfurt-am-Main, and of caves at Stromberg and Dinkelberg. Illustrated with photographs, pasted in, and oversize diagrams, folded in. Volume One: "Das Karst und Höhlengebiet am Dinkelberg." Volume Two: "Der Karst von Stromberg und seine Höhlen." Bound in paper over board.
